flavor: As blood scion of Bodvar the Black, you are charged with the defense of the Granite Tower, a secluded fortress-enclave nestled in the western highlands overlooking Haatar-Baen. You were trained in swordsmanship at a young age and seldom travel without your signature darksword (see Meleguantâ€™s Darkblade).
name: Scion Of The Granite Tower
